DEVICE_MP_FLAG_STEP_ONE.message: 1. Pentru aceasta functie aveti nevoie de Google Chrome
DEVICE_MP_FLAG_STEP_ONE.description: The step one for setting chrome flag.

DEVICE_MP_FLAG_STEP_TWO.message: 2. In bara de search din Chrome vom cauta : chrome://flags
DEVICE_MP_FLAG_STEP_TWO.description: The step two for setting chrome flag.

DEVICE_MP_FLAG_STEP_THREE.message: 3. Cautati in bara de search din flags: #enable-experimental-web-platform-features
DEVICE_MP_FLAG_STEP_THREE.description: The step two for setting chrome flag.

DEVICE_MP_FLAG_STEP_FOUR.message: 4. Dati ENABLE flag-ului : Experimental Web Platform features
DEVICE_MP_FLAG_STEP_FOUR.description: The step three for setting chrome flag.

DEVICE_MP_FLAG_STEP_FIVE.message: 5. In partea de jos dreapta accesam butonul RELAUNCH
DEVICE_MP_FLAG_STEP_FIVE.description: The step three for setting chrome flag.

DEVICE_MP_FLAG_STEP_SIX.message: Dupa repornirea browser-ului vom putea folosii varianta browser.
DEVICE_MP_FLAG_STEP_SIX.description: The step three for setting chrome flag.

DEVICE_MP_FLAG_WARNING.message: ATENTIE! Pentru a functiona trebuie sa fiti pe o conexiune securizata.

DEVICE_MP_SERIAL_BAUDRATE.message: Setati o valoare pentru baudrate. Valoare implicita : 115200.
